data.message: Dissed her in 2013, and now collaborates with her. Eminem's King Lol

replies.message: What song was it?
Eminem - Asshole. On MMLP2
"No doubt, it's like trying to tell gwen stefani she's sold out" em always says it's never personal, just having a laugh.
lol 😂 I herd aśśhole but didn't notice that
@Kimberley it's a song, omg
how can some people be so fucking dummbb

Lol he was just telling which song Eminem dissed Gwen Stefani and the song is called asshole 
Kimberley Owen
Made my morning 😂
Kimberley Owen he wrote a song after you called Kim, you should listen to it bbz

That song was my favorite and I knew the lyrics and I couldn't remember that he dissed her in that song, damn it! Btw my favorite song right now that I really love is Fine Line(ShadyXV) Eminem is my favorite singer/artist
Kim made my morning though😂
Yeah but he also declared his love for her in ass like that "gwen Steffani, won't ya peepee on me"
Epic fail
Kimberley Owen, now you're making yourself sound like an asshole.
And besides, why would I disrespect the guy if he's my favorite rapper. Didn't you see the last part of my comment?
Kimberly you've made your self look like an asshole haha, claiming your a big em fan, don't even know his songs 😂😂
I was there!!!! Best night of my life. He broke Wembley stadium!!! And Dr dre killed it.
I also saw him live last year, best concert ever!
No disrespect intended, but Kimberley, are you perhaps a blonde? | oh, "No Doubt" has a double meaning, since it's also the name of Gwen Stefani's band.

**THIS IS NOT A DISS LINE,  JUST BECAUSE HER NAME IS MENTIONED***

They told me to slow down, (but) i just zoned out / ...good luck tryna convince a blonde, its like tellin Gwen Stefani she 'sold out'/ ...cuz i was tryna "leave no doubt" in anyones mind (that) one day id go down in history!!

***Slim is blonde & he fought for respect. So he'll just zone out when ppl tell him to slow down. Good luck convincing him to bite his tounge cuz he's tryna leave no doubt in anyones mind that one day he will go down in history!***

***Stefani is blonde & leaving her band No Doubt was the best thing for her career, as complicated as it was to do so.... so good luck tryna convince her she's a sellout for doin it!***

Its really quite simple wordplay:---
Eminem - (was trying to leave no doubt...)
Stefani - (was trying to leave No Doubt.)
FINE LINE IS my fav song but KINGS NEVER DIE can change my opinion any minute
Justin beat me to it, the line in "Asshole" wasn't an insult
